sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND prot.id=#id#
SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #id#
SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND ppProt.groupID = #groupId#

SELECT * FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND ppProt.proteinProphetGroupID = #proteinProphetGroupId#

SELECT count(DISTINCT(ppProt.groupID)) FROM ProteinProphetProtein AS ppProt, msProteinInferProtein as prot WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID
AND ppProt.subsumed = #isSubsumed#
SELECT count(*) FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.piRunID = #id# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.subsumed = 0

SELECT prot.id, pprot.groupID FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, ProteinProphetProtein as pprot WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND prot.id = pprot.piProteinID
AND pprot.isSubsumed = #isSubsumed#
SELECT prot.id FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND ppProt.groupID = #groupId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID

SELECT prot.id FROM msProteinInferProtein as prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND ppProt.proteinProphetGroupID = #proteinProphetGroupId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID

SELECT prot.nrseqProteinID FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID
AND ppProt.subsumed = #isSubsumed#

SELECT prot.id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID
AND ppProt.subsumed = #isSubsumed#
ORDER BY ppProt.groupID ASC
SELECT prot.id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID ORDER BY ppProt.groupID ASC

SELECT prot.id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein AS ppProt, ProteinProphetProteinGroup AS ppProtGrp WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.proteinProphetGroupID = ppProtGrp.id ORDER BY ppProtGrp.groupNumber, ppProt.groupID ASC

SELECT prot.id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.probability BETWEEN #minProbability# AND #maxProbability#
ORDER BY ppProt.probability, ppProt.groupID ASC

SELECT prot.nrseqProteinID, prot.id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.probability BETWEEN #minProbability# AND #maxProbability#

SELECT prot.id FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein AS ppProt, ProteinProphetProteinGroup AS ppProtGrp WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.proteinProphetGroupID = ppProtGrp.id AND ppProtGrp.probability BETWEEN #minProbability# AND #maxProbability#
ORDER BY ppProtGrp.probability, ppProtGrp.id, ppProt.groupID ASC

SELECT prot.nrseqProteinID FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein AS ppProt, ProteinProphetProteinGroup AS ppProtGrp WHERE prot.piRunID=#pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.proteinProphetGroupID = ppProtGrp.id AND ppProtGrp.probability BETWEEN #minProbability# AND #maxProbability#
ORDER BY ppProtGrp.probability, ppProtGrp.id, ppProt.groupID ASC

SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein WHERE piRunID=#pinferId# AND coverage BETWEEN #minCoverage# AND #maxCoverage#
ORDER BY coverage ASC

SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein WHERE piRunID=#pinferId# AND coverage BETWEEN #minCoverage# AND #maxCoverage#
ORDER BY coverage ASC

SELECT prot.id AS proteinId, pprot.groupID AS proteinGroupId, pprot.proteinProphetGroupID AS proteinProphetGroupId, prot.coverage AS coverage FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein AS pprot WHERE prot.id = pprot.piProteinID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND prot.coverage BETWEEN #minCoverage# AND #maxCoverage# ORDER BY proteinProphetGroupId, coverage DESC

SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein WHERE piRunID=#pinferId#
AND userValidation IN $validationStatus$
ORDER BY userValidation ASC

SELECT id FROM msProteinInferProtein WHERE piRunID=#pinferId#
AND userValidation IN $validationStatus$
ORDER BY userValidation ASC

SELECT prot.id, count(*) AS cnt FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch AS m, msProteinInferPeptide AS pept, msProteinInferIon AS ion, msProteinInferSpectrumMatch AS psm WHERE prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.piProteinID = m.piProteinID AND m.piPeptideID = pept.id AND pept.id = ion.piPeptideID AND ion.id = psm.piIonID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# GROUP BY prot.id HAVING cnt BETWEEN #minSpectra# AND #maxSpectra#
ORDER BY cnt
, ppProt.proteinProphetGroupID, ppProt.groupID
ASC

SELECT prot.nrseqProteinID, prot.id, count(*) AS cnt FROM msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch AS m, msProteinInferPeptide AS pept, msProteinInferIon AS ion, msProteinInferSpectrumMatch AS psm WHERE prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND ppProt.piProteinID = m.piProteinID AND m.piPeptideID = pept.id AND pept.id = ion.piPeptideID AND ion.id = psm.piIonID AND prot.piRunID = #pinferId# GROUP BY prot.id HAVING cnt BETWEEN #minSpectra# AND #maxSpectra#

SELECT prot.id, count(ion.id) AS cnt FROM (msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as m) LEFT JOIN ( msProteinInferPeptide AS pept, msProteinInferIon AS ion ) ON (m.piPeptideID = pept.id AND pept.id = ion.piPeptideID
AND pept.uniqueToProtein = #uniqueToProtein#
) WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND prot.id = m.piProteinID
AND ppProt.subsumed = #isSubsumed#
GROUP BY prot.id HAVING cnt BETWEEN #minPeptides# AND #maxPeptides#
ORDER BY cnt
, ppProt.proteinProphetGroupID, ppProt.groupID
ASC

SELECT prot.nrseqProteinID, prot.id, count(ion.id) AS cnt FROM (msProteinInferProtein AS prot, ProteinProphetProtein as ppProt, msProteinInferProteinPeptideMatch as m) LEFT JOIN ( msProteinInferPeptide AS pept, msProteinInferIon AS ion ) ON (m.piPeptideID = pept.id AND pept.id = ion.piPeptideID
AND pept.uniqueToProtein = #uniqueToProtein#
) WHERE prot.piRunID = #pinferId# AND prot.id = ppProt.piProteinID AND prot.id = m.piProteinID
AND ppProt.subsumed = #isSubsumed#
GROUP BY prot.id HAVING cnt BETWEEN #minPeptides# AND #maxPeptides#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ProteinProphetProtein ( piProteinID, proteinProphetGroupID, groupID, probability, confidence, subsumed, totalSpectrumCount, pctSpectrumCount) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
